text: During the 7 October 2023 attack on Israel, Hamas's military wing the Qassam Brigades took control of the Erez Crossing, causing hundreds of Palestinian civilians to make their way to the crossing. The attack caused damage to the facilities at the crossing, and the Erez Crossing stayed closed during the Israel–Hamas war that followed until 1 May 2024, when it was reopened for aid transports heading into the Gaza Strip. == Related pages == * Israel–Hamas war * 2023 Hamas-led attack on Israel == References == Category:7 October attacks Category:Blockade of the Gaza Strip
title: Attack on Erez crossing
